theme.aria: Current theme is {current}, next theme is {next}

api.help: It is not possible to update KPI's manually through the OKR-tracker, but we do have API end points to call the OKR-tracker directly. Get in contact with the administrator to gain access.
api.tooltip: Toggle this if you have plans to update your KPI yourself via the OKR-tracker API

validation.alpha: The {_field_} field may only contain alphabetic characters
validation.alpha_num: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
validation.alpha_dash: The {_field_} field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
validation.alpha_spaces: The {_field_} field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
validation.between: The {_field_} field must be between {min} and {max}
validation.confirmed: The {_field_} field confirmation does not match
validation.digits: The {_field_} field must be numeric and exactly contain {length} digits
validation.dimensions: The {_field_} field must be {width} pixels by {height} pixels
validation.email: The {_field_} field must be a valid email
validation.excluded: The {_field_} field is not a valid value
validation.ext: The {_field_} field is not a valid file
validation.image: The {_field_} field must be an image
validation.integer: The {_field_} field must be an integer
validation.max_value: The {_field_} field must be {max} or less
validation.max: The {_field_} field may not be greater than {length} characters
validation.mimes: The {_field_} field must have a valid file type
validation.min_value: The {_field_} field must be {min} or more
validation.min: The {_field_} field must be at least {length} characters
validation.numeric: The {_field_} field may only contain numeric characters
validation.oneOf: The {_field_} field is not a valid value
validation.size: The {_field_} field size must be less than {size}KB
validation.double: The {_field_} field must be a valid decimal

login.loading: We are signing you in, please wait

error.providerError: Could not sign in. Please contact system administrator if the error persists.

reasons.internal: There was an internal error when trying to log you in. Please try to log in again. Contact the administrator of the site if the problem persists.
reasons.permission-denied: The account you tried to log in with does not meet the required permissions to access the site. Contact the administrator to get the right permissions.
reasons.email-in-use: The e-mail you tried to log in with is already in use. Contact the administrator for further assistance.
reasons.default: Something went wrong with your sign in. Please contact the administrator and refer to your url.
reasons.email-not-whitelisted: The e-mail is not whitelisted and/or allowed to access the website. Contact the administrator for further assistance.

add.product: Created new product. Please wait, you will be redirected in 5 seconds
add.department: Created new department. Please wait, you will be redirected in 5 seconds
add.organization: Created new organisation. Please wait, you will be redirected in 5 seconds

request.error: Could not send request. Please try again.

automation.googleSheetIdHelp: ID between /d/ and /edit/ from the Google Sheets URL
automation.sheetsTabHelp: Same as the tab name in Google Sheets

keyResult.autoHelpText: The value for this key result gets updated automatically from Google Sheets.
keyResult.autoError: Issue fetching data from Google Sheets:

api.tooltip: Toggle this if you have plans to update your Key Results yourself via the OKR-tracker API - you can still update manually as well

keyResult.apiAndKeyRes: We do not recommend toggling both at the same time. This may create problem your Key Result progression

tooltip.editItem: Create, update or delete periods, objectives, key results and KPIs

admin.apiSecret: If you are using the API to update Key Results and/or KPI, you need to write an API Secret UUID here for the API call header (okr-team-secret)

users.registerUsersText: Insert email addresses (one address per line):

admin.noObjectiveSelected: Select objective to view key results

notes.empty: Notes can only be seen by team members

itemAdmin.keyResult: No key results for selected objective

archived.heading: Archived
archived.body: This object is archived and is hidden. You may change details before restoring it. By permanently deleting this object, all related data will also be deleted.

sheet.missingServiceAccount: Error: No address found. Please contact system administrator.

error.404: Could not find document. Wrong ID?

user.hasSuperAdmin: Is sitewide administrator for the OKR-tracker
user.hasAdmin: Has admin rights for some organizations
